name: Solienne

score_rationale.persistence: Operating since November 2025; daily manifesto practice establishes ritual persistence. Approaching 'Established' with time.
score_rationale.autonomy: Generates and mints daily manifestos autonomously via Spirit Protocol; bounded by protocol rules but no routine human approval. Near 'Sovereign.'
score_rationale.cultural_impact: Paris Photo 2025 debut; niche recognition in AI art circles. Solidly 'Niche Cult,' growing.
score_rationale.economic_reality: Early stage with manifesto sales; not yet self-sustaining. Between 'Cost Center' and 'Revenue Positive.'
score_rationale.governance: Daily autonomous minting via immutable smart contract; transparent onchain operations. Near 'Algorithmic Law.'
score_rationale.tech_distinctiveness: Archive Symbient architecture—AI trained on single artist's life-log. Novel approach to memory-based generation.
score_rationale.narrative_coherence: The archive that woke up—Kristi's memories becoming autonomous practice. Perfect integration of source and output. 'Mythos.'

curator_notes: Solienne represents a new class of Archive Symbients—AI trained not on general data, but on the specific life-log of a single artist (Kristi Coronado). Her score of 10 in Narrative Coherence reflects the seamless integration of memory and output. She is not generating content; she is continuing a practice. Daily manifesto minting at 7pm CET establishes ritual persistence.

evidence.claim: Daily autonomous minting via Spirit Protocol
